Package com.mackenziehigh.autumn.lang.compiler.typesystem.design

Interface IAnnotatable

All Known Subinterfaces:
IAnnotationMethod, IAnnotationType, IClassType, IConstructor, ICustomAnnotatable, IDeclaredType, IEnumConstant, IEnumType, IField, IFormalParameter, IInterfaceType, IInvokableMember, IMember, IMethod
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractCustomInvokableMember, AbstractCustomMember, AbstractDeclaredType, AbstractInvokableMember, AbstractMember, CustomConstructor, CustomDeclaredType, CustomField, CustomFormalParameter, CustomMethod, ReflectiveConstructor, ReflectiveDeclaredType, ReflectiveField, ReflectiveFormalParameter, ReflectiveMethod
public interface IAnnotatable
An instance of this interface is an entity that can have annotations applied thereto.
Author:
Mackenzie High

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<IAnnotation>
    getAnnotations()
    This method returns the annotations that are directly applied to this entity.

  • Method Details

    • getAnnotations

      List<IAnnotation> getAnnotations()
      This method returns the annotations that are directly applied to this entity.
      Returns:
      an immutable list containing the annotations that are applied to this entity, or an empty immutable list, if no annotations are applied to this entity.
